name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: These are great containers. I had a bunch of red colour containers before and these added different colour so I can store different things to separate. Easy to take straight from fridge and reheat the food. Decor quality. Highly recommended!

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: I like these containers because I can freeze,defrost and heat leftovers in the microwave. They are good quality and I highly recommend them.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: The colours of this 3 set are sooo nice! Makes a change from the usual red. They hold quite a lot and are good for lunches, or for leftovers. They are easy to wash and can be stored by stacking them up in the cupboard so very convenient. Just a word of warning though, the lids break easily.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Good plastic

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Really good container with three different colors. Easy to use, microwave friendly.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Great size for meal prep with measurements on the inside of it

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Happy with this. Good price and as described.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Lid crack not fully freezer proof. Decor seem to have a lot of issues with their lids as the containers are a solid, quality product. A shame really

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: I've not yet used the containers in the microwave. They look solid & with secure lids. The size is practical for leftovers & they are stackable & cheerful. The lid's air vent colour matches it's container. Package arrived promptly. Very affordable so I will order more.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Bought this pack to replace the ones the kids don't return. They'll either leave them at work or forget to return them. These are great replacements.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Using this product to freeze different meats in my freezer.Great quality product.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Great product. As described.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: I use these for my own leftovers taken to work for lunches. Microwave and dishwasher safe. All good.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Bought more of these to replace cracked lids on those we have.  Good product, just sometimes lids crack.  And so when delivered with cracked lid, not great :-)

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Glad I didn't pay full price as the containers don't seem to create a seal when the lid is on. Luckily I followed my instinct and placed the container in a bag before taking it to work. Normally I love the brand.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: These are great quality and bright colours. Just disappointing it turned up with broken lids.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: The container is excellent quality. The steam release on the top of the container is perfect for microwaving.I strongly recommend this product.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Love these.  Good size. Good seal. Good quality

reviews: ALL GOOD IF A BIT SMALL.....

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Store well in freezer .. cooks great in microwave

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: These are the perfect size to reheat or cook a single serve dinner. Wash in top of dishwasher, very practical, AND colourful.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: I have been using them but they are not easy to wash. The oil in food sticks and very hard to come off. Glass is much better. These are good for fruits or nuts though

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Happy with these / I usually buy from Woolwrths, but happier with that price .

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: These containers are wonderful they have great sealing and fantastic colours

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: Great price and fast delivery but lids turned up smashed

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: I bought 6 Microwavable Container, Oblong, 900ml.THEY LEAK!!!!How can you sell things lite this that just don't work???What is the point of packing your lunch in these if it ends up destroying everything in your laptop bag?I want a refund and I want you to warn people that these LEAK!!!They don't leak from the microwave breather hole - that would be forgivable... they leak arount the kid - around the edge... they just are useless!

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviewer: Delivery was quick but product came with smashed lids
reviews: I purchased these before in a supermarket, and was really happy to see them listed on Amazon for a cheaper price. I really like these containers for using in the microwave and for storing things in the fridge or freezer. The colours are cute, the lids are interchangeable and have a cool steam thing, and they're the perfect size for a single portion for lunch at work.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviewer: Delivery was quick but product came with smashed lids
reviews: Bought a few of these to replace disposable containers and they are great they also have colour coded lids. They are especially great for arthritic hands as even with a poor grip the lids come off / on easily. Nice size, good quality, easy to use, great for arthritic hands.
